metadata.title: CVE-2021-39685 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In various setup methods of the USB gadget subsystem, there is a possibleout of bounds write due to an incorrect flag check. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-210292376References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
